properties.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 8:11PM PST until January 16 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Storm total snow accumulations
of 3 to 6 inches. Any freezing rain accumulations will be light
and should generally remain less than a tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. In
Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY
